author: Richard Sandomir
title: Wanda Young, Motown Hitmaker With the Marvelettes, Dies at 78
description: She was the lead voice on “Don’t Mess With Bill” and other songs written by Smokey Robinson, who said she “had this little voice that was sexy to me.”
